html: (2 Nephi 8:25)."Loose thyself from the bands of thy neck." "The scattered remnants are exhorted to return to the Lord from whence they have fallen; which if they do, the promise of the Lord is that He will speak to them, or give them revelation. [See Isaiah 52:6-8.] The bands of her neck are the curses of God upon her, or the remnants of Israel in their scattered condition among the Gentiles." (BMC, 168; see also D&C 113:9-10.)
